name: INSERT
description: Data was added to the database $table table.

name: UPDATE
description: Data was edited in the database $table table.

name: DELETE
description: Data was deleted from the database $table table.

name: TRUNCATE
description: All data was deleted from the database $table table and saved to a log file.

name: ALTER
description: The database $table table's structure was altered.

name: DROP
description: The database $table table was deleted and saved to a log file.

name: RESTORE
description: The database $table table was restored from a log file.
